Class Applicant

java.lang.Object
User
Applicant
Direct Known Subclasses:
HDBOfficer
public class Applicant extends User
Represents an applicant in the housing application system. Inherits from the User class and contains additional information related to BTO application and enquiry.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Applicant(String nric, String pwd, String role, HashMap<String, List<String>> correct_map)
    Constructs an Applicant with the specified NRIC, password, role, and a correctness mapping.

  • Constructor Details

    • Applicant

      public Applicant(String nric, String pwd, String role, HashMap<String, List<String>> correct_map)
      Constructs an Applicant with the specified NRIC, password, role, and a correctness mapping.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the applicant
      pwd - the password for the applicant
      role - the role of the user (should be "Applicant")
      correct_map - a map used for correctness checking in the application

  • Method Details

    • set_application

      public void set_application(Application app)
      Sets the BTO application for the applicant.
      Parameters:
      app - the Application object to assign

    • set_enquiry

      public void set_enquiry(Enquiry enq)
      Sets the enquiry made by the applicant.
      Parameters:
      enq - the Enquiry object to assign

    • set_typeOf_flat

      public void set_typeOf_flat(String typeFlat)
      Sets the type of flat the applicant has booked.
      Parameters:
      typeFlat - the flat type (e.g., "two", "three")

    • get_application

      public Application get_application()
      Returns the BTO application of the applicant.
      Returns:
      the Application object

    • get_enquiry

      public Enquiry get_enquiry()
      Returns the enquiry submitted by the applicant.
      Returns:
      the Enquiry object

    • get_typeOf_flat

      public String get_typeOf_flat()
      Returns the type of flat the applicant has booked.
      Returns:
      the flat type as a string

    • generate_receipt

      public void generate_receipt()
      Generates and prints a receipt containing applicant details and the type of flat applied for. Called from ApplicationManager.printReceipt().
